prompt: Can you recommend a free app for live time translation during a call with French speakers?

hidden_queries: free app real-time translation during a call with French speakers
app that translates live phone calls for free French translation
metadata.generated_search_query: free app real-time translation during a call with French speakers

citation_mappings.claim_text: Here are some free or freemium apps you can use to translate in real time during calls or conversation with French speakers. Note that fully free real-time phone call translation is rare; many offer free tiers with limitations: üì± Apps / Tools 1. Google Translate (Live Conversation + headphones) Has a Live Translate feature that listens in real time and translates speech between languages. Works in conversation mode and, with earbuds, can give spoken translation. Not traditional call integration, but useful for two-way voice translation during chats. Tom's Guide

sources.title: TalkPersona - Free real-time voice translator
sources.snippet: In addition to the AI video chatbot, TalkPersona also offers a free Instant Voice Translator for Real-Time Multilingual Conversations. It enables seamless real-time cross-language conversations. Always listens and instantly translates between your language and foreign languages, with optional audio playback. Perfect for travel, business, and cross-language communication.

citation_mappings.claim_text: 2. TalkPersona ‚Äì Instant Voice Translator Free real-time voice translator that listens and instantly translates between languages, including French. Good for real-time spoken conversion (not native phone call integration). TalkPersona

sources.title: Live Translate | Real-Time Online Voice Translator
sources.snippet: Real-time audio translation with AI voice cloning. Fast, accurate, and low-latency‚Äîavailable in 125+ languages with integrations and sharing. Try it free today.

citation_mappings.claim_text: 3. Web browser real-time translators (e.g., Maestra) Browser-based tool that listens and translates speech in real time. Works for live conversations if you hold phone mic near speaker or share audio. Free to try in browser. Maestra

4. AI Phone: Call & Voice Translator (iOS/Android) Offers real-time translation of calls and voice/video calls in many languages including French. Free to download and use with limitations; premium unlocks full features. Not 100% free long-term, but a solid free tier to test. App Store

sources.title: Samsung reveals TEN mega features coming to four devices as part of free upgrade including text message game-changer
sources.snippet:
Samsung is rolling out a major free upgrade, One UI 6.1, to four more device lines starting in May 2024. Originally launched with the Galaxy S23 series and already available for Galaxy Z Flip 5 and Z Fold 5, the update is now coming to Galaxy S22, Galaxy Z Flip 4, Galaxy Z Fold 4, and the Galaxy Tab S8 series. One UI 6.1 introduces ten new AI-powered features designed to enhance usability and productivity. Key upgrades include:

- **Browsing Assist**, which summarizes web pages using AI,
- **Chat Assist**, offering real-time message translation in 13+ languages,
- **Circle to Search**, allowing users to visually search by circling items on the screen,
- **AI-generated wallpaper** for customized designs,
- **Edit suggestion** to adjust tone and grammar in messages,
- **Generative Edit** for enhanced photo object removal,
- **Interpreter** for live, in-person translation,
- **Live Translate** for real-time call translations,
- **Note Assist** to auto-summarize Samsung Notes,
- **Transcript Assist** to transcribe recorded speech.

These innovations aim to bring advanced Galaxy AI functionality‚Äîfirst seen in the Galaxy S24‚Äîto older devices, expanding access to powerful tools across the Samsung ecosystem.

citation_mappings.claim_text: ‚ö†Ô∏è Notes on phone call translation Fully free automatic translation during regular phone calls is uncommon without some paid limits or subscriptions. Many apps will require both participants to use the same tool or use speakerphone + separate translator. Built-in phone OS features (Android Live Translate or upcoming iOS live translation) can also help but depend on device and region. The Sun+1
